Posts.Content: Please tell me what 714x is and who Billi Best is. My wife has metastatic breast cancer that spread to the liver. Any help would be greatly appreciated.

Posts.Content: My wife has metestatic breast cancer in the liver, she is on arimidex, gemzar, navalbine, once a month faslodex. please tell me what MGN-3 is and if it helps and where I can get it. My wife is only 44 yrs. old and we have four small children, any information would be greatly appreciated. Thank You, Seth R.
